title: Fried mushrooms

properties.name: description
properties.value: Fried mushrooms are a type of food that can be obtained by cooking sliced mushrooms on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 46 Cooking and granting 60 experience when successful. Players may burn the mushrooms while cooking one, resulting in a burnt mushroom; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 90 on both ranges and fires. When eaten, fried mushrooms heal 5 hitpoints.

Item ID7082

Fried mushrooms are a type of food that can be obtained by cooking sliced mushrooms on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 46 Cooking and granting 60 experience when successful. Players may burn the mushrooms while cooking one, resulting in a burnt mushroom; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 90 on both ranges and fires. When eaten, fried mushrooms heal 5 hitpoints.

As a cooking ingredient, they can be combined with fried onions to create mushroom & onion at level 57 Cooking. Mushroom and onion can be used at level 64 with a potato with butter to create mushroom potatoes for 55 experience.

[[File:Fried mushrooms detail.png|left|200px]]
'''Fried mushrooms''' are a type of [[food]] that can be obtained by cooking [[sliced mushrooms]] on a [[fire]] or [[cooking range]], requiring level 46 [[Cooking]] and granting 60 experience when successful. Players may burn the mushrooms while cooking one, resulting in a [[burnt mushroom]]; the [[burn rate]] while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at [[Cooking]] level 90 on both ranges and fires. When eaten, fried mushrooms heal 5 [[hitpoints]].

As a cooking ingredient, they can be combined with [[fried onions]] to create [[mushroom & onion]] at level 57 [[Cooking]]. Mushroom and onion can be used at level 64 with a [[potato with butter]] to create [[mushroom potato]]es for 55 experience.
